String.string: Move quickly! Don't let Kanmur's death be in vain!
[Allemantheia HQ] Report to Commander Fraya and speak with her about Thulsa's movements.
[Forgeheart in Kaiator] Find Commander Tamur and ask for Kaiator's aid in stopping Thulsa.
You've arrived at the Plaza of Triumph!
[Plaza of Triumph] The situation has suddenly changed. Go to Adjutant Daakem and inquire what you should do now.
[Plaza of Triumph] Take Tamur's news to Ragnar.
[Trade House] Take Tamur's news to Garuk.
[Shopping District] Tell Karima that you're ready to speak to Tamur.
[Speak with Karima to visit the Kaiator Headquarters.] Report to Tamur.
